description:
The law firm of Simon Sarver Attorneys at Law in Paterson, New Jersey, offers unmatched legal counsel and support to clients throughout Passaic County and beyond who have needs involving any of the following:

  • Personal injury
  • Workers' compensation
  • Criminal defense
  • DUI and traffic violations defense

Founded in 1936, our law firm has a long and rich history of serving the residents and businesses of our community. We have grown to include additional law offices in East Orange and Mahwah, and we have become one of our region's premier sources for quality, professional and effective legal representation and service.

Today, experienced attorney Gregory M. Jachts leads our practice, and he continues our tradition of providing the highest level of advocacy possible for our clients who are dealing with complex and pressing legal challenges that threaten their livelihoods, their freedom and their future. To date, we have recovered millions of dollars in total compensation for our plaintiff injury clients while securing numerous acquittals, dismissals and reductions of charges for the accused.

To find out more about how we can best assist you with your legal matter and improve the likelihood you will obtain the favorable outcome you seek and the justice you deserve, you can contact Simon Sarver Attorneys at Law to schedule a free initial consultation. We also offer virtual consultations to help keep you and your loved ones safe in these uncertain times.
